user.title: Connect to AZ Router
user.description: Enter connection details for your AZ Router web interface.

set_master_boost.name: Master Boost
set_master_boost.description: Enable or disable Master Boost on the main AZ Router unit.

set_device_boost.name: Device Boost
set_device_boost.description: Enable or disable Boost on one or more devices.

set_device_type_1_max_power.name: Smart Slave – Max Power
set_device_type_1_max_power.description: Set the maximum allowed load power for Smart Slave devices (deviceType=1).

set_device_type_1_temperatures.name: Smart Slave – Temperatures
set_device_type_1_temperatures.description: Set target and/or Boost temperatures for Smart Slave devices (deviceType=1).

set_device_type_4_manual_power.name: Wallbox – Manual Charging Power
set_device_type_4_manual_power.description: Set the manual charging power limit for Wallbox devices (deviceType=4). The allowed limit depends on the installed circuit breaker.

manual_power.name: Manual Charging Power (W)
manual_power.description: Charging power in watts. The valid range is automatically checked based on the device’s circuit breaker.
